name: Commercial Cultivation Services
coverLetter:
Top shelf manicuring, live plant processing, propagation and germination. Experience with various trimming machines as well and high output demands. Experience with curing, burping, packaging, nitrogen injection. Live resin (award winning) and cartridge splits with packaging. Video recording and storage of project per batch.


Piece work, hourly, or per project.


Client can 1099 entire crew as independent contractors at end of project.
